name: Style Abandoned
description:
About

A style for generating pictures of abandoned things and abandoned places. It adds a touch of rust and decay to everything and everyone. It wasn't intended for generating pictures of people, it will generate pictures of people with rust and decay on their skin (this is known issue - you have been warned). Useful for surreal, horror, post-apocalyptic scenes.

Trained from a single photo of a rusted car in field. This is my first thing I've trained using DreamArtist, constructive feedback is appreciated. I may look at fixing the issues with generating pictures of people in a future version.

Installation

Place in the directory where you keep your embeddings

Usage

use style-abandoned2 in your prompt, experiment with placing it at the beginning, middle or end of your prompt.

meta.prompt: a  raw photograph,   a jazz guitar mounted on a wall ,  sharp focus, , style-abandoned2
a  photograph,   a car on the road leading to the eiffel ,  sharp focus, by  style-abandoned2
a  raw photograph, portrait  of a  porsche 911, sharp focus,, style-abandoned2
meta.negativePrompt: , low quality, worst quality,  jpeg artefacts, blurry , distorted, mutated, out of focus, muted colours, overexposed, chromatic aberration,

meta.prompt: a  raw photograph,  a kaiju  sitting  on its roost in a city , sharp focus, center focus, style-abandoned2
(masterpiece),  a sinister creature skulking  in a building    , 8k, highest quality , by style-abandoned2
